alert.note: Alert for Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 12:53PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Yolo, southern Sutter, north central Sacramento and southwestern Placer Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1252 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arco Arena, or 9 miles north of Sacramento, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Funnel clouds are possible with this storm. Locations impacted include... Sacramento, Roseville, Citrus Heights, Rio Linda, Antelope, Elverta, Arco Arena, Foothill Farms and North Highlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
